021import net.tnemc.core.transaction.tax.TaxEntry;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.maps.MapKey;
023
024import java.util.Optional;
025
026/**
027 * Represents a type of {@link Transaction}. This is used to hold basic options surrounding
028 * transaction types.
029 *
030 * @author creatorfromhell
031 * @see Transaction
032 * @since 0.1.2.0
033 */
034public interface TransactionType {
035
036  /**
037   * The identifier of this transaction type.
038   *
039   * @return The unique identifier for this transaction type. Should be human-friendly.
040   */
041  @MapKey
042  String identifier();
043
044  /**
045   * The taxation amount to be assessed on the recipient of the transaction. This will take the
046   * amount from the amount being sent to the account, and send it to the server account.
047   *
048   * @return The {@link TaxEntry} related to the taxation amount for the recipient, if applicable,
049   * otherwise an empty optional.
050   */
051  Optional<TaxEntry> toTax();
052
053  /**
054   * The taxation amount to be assessed on the sender of the transaction. This will add the amount
055   * to the amount being sent to the account, and send it to the server account.
056   *
057   * @return The {@link TaxEntry} related to the taxation amount for the sender, if applicable,
058   * otherwise an empty optional.
059   */
060  Optional<TaxEntry> fromTax();
061}
